top_stories.title: DeepRead: Document Structure-Aware Reasoning to Enhance Agentic Search
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.05014v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: With the rapid progress of tool-using and agentic large language models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is evolving from one-shot, passive retrieval into multi-turn, decision-driven evidence acquisition. top_stories.technical_takeaway: Agent orchestration is emerging as a new software abstraction layer.
top_stories.primary_risk: Debugging complexity and cascading failures in agentic systems.

top_stories.title: The Technologies Changing How You’ll Watch the 2026 Winter Olympic Games
top_stories.summary: From drones with “first-person” visualization to real-time 360-degree replays and Olympics GPT, get ready to immerse yourself in the Winter Games in Milan and Cortina.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Reinforces known techniques with modest refinements to existing methods.

top_stories.title: Interfaze: The Future of AI is built on Task-Specific Small Models
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.04101v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present Interfaze, a system that treats modern LLM applications as a problem of building and acting over context, not just picking the right monolithic model. Instead of a single transformer, we combine (i) a stack of heterogeneous DNNs paired with small language models as perception modules for OC
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Signals incremental evolution rather than a paradigm shift in current AI systems.
top_stories.primary_risk: Marginal performance gains may not justify integration effort.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Practical improvements when layered onto existing AI workflows.
